---
title: "Critical Friend/Analytical Assurer Responsibilities"
description: ""
---

The critical friend/analytical assurer provides independent advice to the Commissioner on the analysis being undertaken throughout project 

They will provide assurance that: 

- the question is answered. 

- the analytical plan is appropriate and meets scope.  

- the quality assurance plan is at the right level to support decision making.   

- the team followed the quality assurance plan. It includes an appropriate audit trail.  

- the analysis is fit for purpose. It makes clear any risks associated with the analysis.
